splits line by vertex

Source: R/sfx_explode.R
sfx_explode.Rd

sfx_explode splits line by vertex

sfx_explode(x, ...)

Arguments

x

spatial lines.
...

ignored

Value

spatial lines

Author

Michael Summer githubdot/hypertidy/silicate/issues/102

Examples

{
# Do not run
data(emisco)
emisco <- emisco[1:100, "V8"]
dfco <- sfx_explode(emisco)
etm <- to_munich(sdf = dfco)
names(etm)
class(etm)
head(etm$Emissions)
head(etm$Street)
write.table(x = etm$Emissions, file = paste0(tempfile(), "_Emissions.txt"),
row.names = FALSE, sep = " ", quote = FALSE)
write.table(x = etm$Street, file = paste0(tempfile(), "_Street.txt"),
row.names = FALSE, sep = " ", quote = FALSE)
}

#> Linking to GEOS 3.8.0, GDAL 3.0.4, PROJ 6.3.1
